summary: The story of a 16 year old girl and her repressive relationship with her mother against the backdrop of 1950's America.
cast: Carrie Snodgress|Margaret Avery|Jennifer Rubin|Matt Lattanzi|Tommy Swerdlow|Dendrie Taylor|Richard Haines|Ian Patrick Williams|David Shurtleff|Hal Havins|Kathryn Atwood|Cassandra Lee Hamilton|Ira Ingber|Jerry Jumonville|Stanley Kipper|Larry Taylor|Frank Strike|Danny Mora
title: Blueberry Hill
